openaiSpec.name: mboum_technical_indicators
openaiSpec.description: Access MBOUM's technical indicators API for stock market technical analysis, including moving averages, oscillators, trend indicators, and volatility metrics. Use this plugin when you need technical analysis data rather than fundamental information.

requestDetails.description: An object containing the target Mboum technical indicators endpoint and its specific parameters.

endpoint.description: The specific Mboum API endpoint for technical indicators. Select the most appropriate endpoint based on the user's request.

queryParams.description: Parameters required for the selected endpoint. Different endpoints need different parameters.

period.description: Time period for historical data (required for most endpoints).

interval.description: Time interval for data points (required for most endpoints).

time_period.description: Number of periods for indicator calculation (required for most endpoints).

series_type.description: Type of price series to use (required for most endpoints).

fast_period.description: Fast period for MACD calculation (required for MACD endpoint).

slow_period.description: Slow period for MACD calculation (required for MACD endpoint).

signal_period.description: Signal period for MACD calculation (required for MACD endpoint).

k_period.description: K period for Stochastic calculation (required for Stochastic endpoints).

d_period.description: D period for Stochastic calculation (required for Stochastic endpoints).

standard_deviations.description: Number of standard deviations for Bollinger Bands (required for BB endpoint).
